msg.msgText:
The values of the configuration items of the "RemoteLogServer" composite object can be obtained by using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command. The "RemoteLogServer" composite object defines the settings that are used for forwarding MessageSight log messages to a remote syslog server.
SYNTAX: imaserver show RemoteLogServer help imaserver show RemoteLogServer
EXAMPLE: imaserver show RemoteLogServer
The following configuration items are returned: Driver The type of the destination for forwarded messages. Host The host name or IP address of the remote syslog server. Port The port number to use when connecting to the remote syslog server. Enabled Whether message forwarding is enabled.
